programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: A loser and his slacker best friend who work at a soulless telemarketing company discover their new boss is a vampire who is turning their coworkers into fellow bloodsuckers.

programme.title: Shrooms
programme.desc: A group of friends are stalked and murdered whilst looking for psilocybin mushrooms in the Irish woods.

programme.title: A Fantastic Fear Of Everything
programme.desc: A crime novelist whose research on Victorian serial killers has turned him into a paranoid wreck must confront his worst fears when a film executive takes a sudden interest in his movie script.

programme.title: Tragedy Girls
programme.desc: A twist on the slasher genre, following two death-obsessed teenage girls who use their online show about real-life tragedies to send their small mid-western town into a frenzy, and cement their legacy as modern horror legends.

programme.title: Succubus
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: The Man of Steel fights a mad scientist who is destroying Metropolis with an energy cannon.

programme.title: The Exorcist III: Legion (Director's Cut)
programme.desc: William Peter Blatty's director's cut of "The Exorcist III" which was thought to be lost. Recovered and released in 2016 under its original title, this is the definitive cut of the film based on his novel "Legion".

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: While investigating an egyptologist's mysterious death, Superman must battle dangerous mummies.

programme.title: Hammer House Of Horror
programme.desc: A man sees the number nine everywhere and is convinced the forces of evil are at work.

programme.title: Studio 666
programme.desc: In Studio 666, the legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into an Encino mansion steeped in grisly rock and roll history to record their much anticipated 10th album. Once in the house, Dave Grohl finds himself grappling with supernatural forces that threaten both the completion of the album and the lives of the band.

programme.title: Dominion: Prequel To The Exorcist
programme.desc: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu leads to the rediscovery of his faith.

programme.title: Thriller
programme.desc: After an actress who plays a nun in a TV series meets a strange fan, several cast members meet with fatal or near-fatal accidents.

programme.title: Succubus
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: The Man of Steel fights a mad scientist who is destroying Metropolis with an energy cannon.

programme.desc: William Peter Blatty's director's cut of "The Exorcist III" which was thought to be lost. Recovered and released in 2016 under its original title, this is the definitive cut of the film based on his novel "Legion".
